variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 80% when compared to wildtype.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent experiments were performed using different passages of HEK293 cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was loaded and analyzed in triplicate for each experimental condition.

Basic positive control.Description: A plasmid containing the wild-type TP53 cDNA sequence was transfected into HEK293 cells and used as a positive control for protein expression.

Basic negative control.Description: A plasmid containing the empty vector was transfected into HEK293 cells and used as a negative control, ensuring that observed signals were specific to TP53 expression.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by Tukey's post-hoc test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression between 80% and 120% of the control group, consistent with previous studies.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 80% or greater than 120% of the control group
